Neeta Lulla to exhibit Paithani line

National Award winning designer Neeta Lulla, known for exquisite bridal and trousseau designs, will showcase an exclusive Paithani collection consisting of contemporary separates, as part of the ‘Make in India’ initiative.

The fashion show is scheduled to be held in Mumbai on February 17 under the ‘Maharashtra Textiles Show/ Make in Maharashtra’ event.

“I am truly humbled to be a part of this nationwide phenomenon. To me, it’s about celebrating the true spirit of Maharashtra and India,” said Lulla. The designer will showcase a Paithani range with the collection ranging from flowing lehangas to long kurtas to jackets, dhoti pants and sarong skirts.

“Paithani uses the ancient technique of tapestry where multiple threads of different colours along with gold and silver threads are woven together to form a fascinating piece,” she said. — IANS
title: Neeta Lulla to exhibit Paithani line at Make in India Week (With Image)
